snippet.title: Out of Hands - Teaser Trailer - Use photos of my hands to make a game...
snippet.description:
Hi, I'm an indie developer with a very limited art background so I made a game from photos of my hands.

About the game
Out of Hands is a thrilling title that blends video-collage graphics with gripping psychological horror. Will you seek the truth that lurks shrouded in a wicked, warped world—and can you bear its weight? Misty memories threaten to tear you apart, and contort you into a being made... Out of Hands.

Follow us
Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1839810/Out_Of_Hands/
Discord:  https://discord.com/invite/3sRHKMYjcq
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/PlayOutofHands
Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/playoutofhands/
